description: This application can be used to receive the photocopy of the semester result answer script and allows the student to decide on revaluation.
procedure: Collect the form from the office of the respective department.
Specify your program (e.g., B.Tech, M.Tech) and year of study.
Enter the receipt number after the fee is paid.
Submit the completed form to the Controller of Examinations office.

description: This form can be used to obtain a Bonafide Certificate and details about the fee structure and receipt for scholarship or educational loan purposes. It is also used for applying for passports.
procedure: Collect the form from the office of the respective department.
Complete and submit the form as per the department requirements.

description: This form can be used to request a long leave due to illness and allows for a reduced attendance requirement of 70%.
procedure: Collect the form from the office of the respective department.
Specify the reason for medical leave (e.g., illness, injury).
Mention the date when the medical condition started.
Attach relevant medical documents (doctor notes or prescriptions).
Submit the form with any necessary approvals from authorities like the academic advisor, department head, or health center.
Include the current date of submission.

description: This form is used to identify and acknowledge the completion of a studentâ€™s course.
procedure: Collect the form from the office of the respective department.
Enter the date when the certificate is issued.
The student should sign in the designated space.
The Head of the Department should sign below.

form_name: Application for Revaluation of Answer Script Form
description: This form is used to request the revaluation of an answer script after reviewing the initial photocopy.
procedure: Collect the form from the office of the respective department.
Enter the receipt number after the fee is paid.
Submit the completed form to the Controller of Examinations office.

description: This certificate indicates the percentage of attendance secured by the student for a specific semester or academic year.
procedure: Collect the certificate template from the office of the respective department.
Include the percentage of attendance secured in the specified semester.
Specify the academic year during which the attendance was recorded.
Verify that the attendance details are accurate for the indicated semesters.
Use the certificate as required for scholarship or other application purposes.

description: This certificate is used to confirm that the student has no pending dues across various departments.
procedure: Obtain the No Due Certificate form from the office of your respective department.

Visit the following departments to get signatures or stamps confirming no dues: Library, Hostel, Office (Fees) - Cash Counter, COE (Controller of Examinations) Office, Alumni Association (Department), HECE Cell (Department), Placement Cell.
Write down the receipt number on the form after the fee is paid (if applicable).
Submit the completed form to the office or department.

description: This form allows students to request a gate pass for leaving campus for a valid reason.
procedure: Collect the form from the office of the respective department.
Clearly state the purpose of requesting the gate pass in the 'Purpose' section.
Ensure the form has the Department Seal to validate it.
Submit the completed form to the appropriate department or security checkpoint, as per the college gate pass policies.
